title: Creation

source:
ctx.a = new Vec3(3, 4, 5)
ctx.b = new Vec3(1, 2, 3)

title: Addition
source:
logger.log('a:', ctx.a)
logger.log('b:', ctx.b)
logger.log('a + b:', ctx.a.clone().add(ctx.b))

title: Subtraction
source:
logger.log('a:', ctx.a)
logger.log('b:', ctx.b)
logger.log('a - b:', ctx.a.clone().sub(ctx.b))

title: Dot product
source:
logger.log('a:', ctx.a)
logger.log('b:', ctx.b)
logger.log('a · b:', ctx.a.dot(ctx.b))

title: Cross product
source:
logger.log('a:', ctx.a)
logger.log('b:', ctx.b)
logger.log('a × b:', ctx.a.clone().cross(ctx.b))

title: Distance
source:
const other = new Vec3(0, 0, 0)
logger.log('v:', ctx.v)
logger.log('other:', other)
logger.log('distance:', ctx.v.distanceTo(other))

title: Angle
Lerp
source:
const a = new Vec3(0, 0, 0)
const b = new Vec3(10, 10, 10)
logger.log('a:', a)
logger.log('b:', b)
logger.log('25%:', a.clone().lerp(b, 0.25))
logger.log('50%:', a.clone().lerp(b, 0.5))
logger.log('75%:', a.clone().lerp(b, 0.75))

title: Reflect
Project on vector
Example
source:
const result = new Vec3(1, 0, 0)
    .multiplyScalar(5)
    .add(new Vec3(0, 3, 0))
    .normalize()
logger.log('result:', result)
